   1 # -*- coding=utf-8 -*-
   2 import sys
   3 
   4 import six
   5 
   6 if sys.version_info[:2] <= (3, 4):
   7     from pipenv.vendor.pathlib2 import Path  # type: ignore  # noqa
   8 else:
   9     from pathlib import Path
  10 
  11 if six.PY3:
  12     from functools import lru_cache
  13     from builtins import TimeoutError
  14 else:
  15     from backports.functools_lru_cache import lru_cache  # type: ignore  # noqa
  16 
  17     class TimeoutError(OSError):
  18         pass
  19 
  20 
  21 def getpreferredencoding():
  22     import locale
  23     # Borrowed from Invoke
  24     # (see https://github.com/pyinvoke/invoke/blob/93af29d/invoke/runners.py#L881)
  25     _encoding = locale.getpreferredencoding(False)
  26     if six.PY2 and not sys.platform == "win32":
  27         _default_encoding = locale.getdefaultlocale()[1]
  28         if _default_encoding is not None:
  29             _encoding = _default_encoding
  30     return _encoding
  31 
  32 
  33 DEFAULT_ENCODING = getpreferredencoding()
  34 
  35 
  36 def fs_str(string):
  37     """Encodes a string into the proper filesystem encoding"""
  38 
  39     if isinstance(string, str):
  40         return string
  41     assert not isinstance(string, bytes)
  42     return string.encode(DEFAULT_ENCODING)
